documentation.text: @dev This contract provides support and utilities for contract ownership.
@dev used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

devdoc.details: This contract provides support and utilities for contract ownership.

OwnerUpdate(address,address).details: triggered when the owner is updated

transferOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner
